entry.title: Combined summary - Libconsensus completion plan document (with pictures)
entry.summary: A developer has created a repository for phase 2 of a project, in which they previously attempted to encapsulate consensus code without exposing anything else. The developer was unsuccessful in getting review before, so they decided to turn "phase 2" into "expose verifyHeader" again. The repository includes images, latex file and pdf. Some phases can be done in different order or in parallel.An implementation of phase 2 (expose verifyHeader()) can be seen in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8493. This implementation is available for review and feedback. The developer is open to questions or comments regarding the project.
